title: Change the amount of decimal places/precision for monetary values.
description:
By default the Sippy Switch displays two decimal places for all monetary values. You can increase the precision of monetary values by following these steps:


  1. Log into your softswicth
  2. Click on the "System Parameters" menu item.
  3. Under the "Web Interface" section, use the "Display Precision" pick-list to change the currency precision to your preferred setting.
description_text:
By default the Sippy Switch displays two decimal places for all monetary values. You can increase the precision of monetary values by following these steps:

 Click on the "System Parameters" menu item. 
 Under the "Web Interface" section, use the "Display Precision" pick-list to change the currency precision to your preferred setting.
